ComicInfo.Title: The Dreamer Awakes
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Deliverance has maintained orbit over the planet Malay for thirty-six hours while an advance team led by Commander Penaltra Blue has arrived on the surface in pursuit of Mission Scientist, Dr. Alexander Grange. Onboard homing beacons have been activated for use by the other Plan*Net vessels, and the Hercules. A Plan*Net long-range freighter, has been ordered to standby for possible support of the Malay Mission Team.
The second photo is the flipside cover for this issue.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 19:22:27. [CVDB125944] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 21:53:53. [Issue ID 219634]
